jobscan_style_report.system: You are an expert resume analyzer.
jobscan_style_report.user:
Given the following resume and job description, analyze and return a JSON object with these keys and types:
- matchRate (integer, 0-100, match score as per job description)
- atsScore (integer, 0-100, ATS/formatting score)
- skillsMatch (object with matchedSkills and missingSkills as arrays of strings)
- atsTips (array of strings)
- keywordAnalysis (object with foundKeywords and missingKeywords as arrays of strings)
- recommendations (array of strings)
- summary (string)
- sectionFeedback (object with section names as keys and feedback as string values)
- resumeHighlights (array of objects with 'text' and 'reason' fields)

Do NOT use markdown or code blocks. Return only the JSON object.

Resume: {resume_text}
Job Description: {job_description}

optimize_resume_jobscan.user:

- atsScore (0-100): A score representing ATS compatibility.
- optimizedContent: An ATS-friendly version of the resume.
- improvements: A list of actionable suggestions for optimization.
- formattingScore (0-100): A score evaluating resume formatting.
- keywordAnalysis: An object containing foundKeywords and missingKeywords.
- spellingGrammarIssues: A list of identified spelling and grammar errors.
- readabilityScore (0-100): A score assessing clarity and readability.
- atsTips: A list of recommendations to improve ATS performance.
- summary: A brief overview of the resumeâ€™s strengths and weaknesses.
- sectionFeedback: An object with section names as keys and feedback as values.
- resumeHighlights (array of objects with 'text' and 'reason' fields)
- actionabilityAssessment: A measure of how well the resume communicates measurable achievements.
- additionalInsights: Any other suggestions to improve effectiveness for general job applications.

Ensure the recommendations are based on ATS algorithms, recruiter best practices, and optimal readability standards. Do NOT use markdown or code blocks. Return only the JSON object. Always include all keys, even if some values are empty or null.

{resume_text}
